name: dinosaur on the run - desert
description: You're a cute, adorable dinosaur who is running away from a ferocious monster! When he is running away, the dinosaur finds a special power that he has! Find out the secret power and jump and duck under obstacles in your way as you run away from the monster! Use the space bar to jump and the down arrow key to duck under birds. Go as far as you can without touching birds and cacti!
